section.p: A narrow-hulled ship with triangular sails pulls alongside. At the rail are turbanned men from Mithdrak, a port of fabulous renown to the far west.
The merchants offer to trade cargo with you. They have 2 Cargo Units of textiles, which they are willing to exchange on a one-for-one basis for Units of furs, timber or grain.
